column5:
Ketamine helps a great deal! I have a channel dedicated to it somewhere in my history should be an invite link. The thing that sucks is the god damn cost!

I was doing really well and was almost off of Kratom completely at the beginning when I started infusions. So you‚Äôll be even more ok after ketamine ‚ô•Ô∏è

I‚Äôm currently crashing from a booster I got two weeks ago, so I upped my Kratom use again. Just a warning. Don‚Äôt be like me :)

I hear you! We‚Äôve been numbing ourselves for so long! There are other natural supplements you can take for stamina at the gym. Mood swings is the reason I take it to begin with. I‚Äôm under psychiatric care and nothing helps like Kratom did. But what goes up must come down. It stopped working and I‚Äôm just fooling myself.

Going through this exactly right now. Can‚Äôt stop crying. Up until yesterday I thought I was on an upward trajectory.... a little at least. 

Each time it comes back it hurts more and more. Because I get my hopes up when I‚Äôm feeling ok. Start planning my future and all the things I will be doing to change my life situations. And once depression shows it‚Äôs ugly head all my dreams feel crushed. And I feel dumb for having had hope. I‚Äôm so fkn bitter! Fuck this disease 

I was getting ketamine infusions. They stop me from having suicidal thoughts. I‚Äôm crashing today from an infusion I got two weeks ago. And I just don‚Äôt have the time nor the money to go get another infusion. 

Also, I found out today kaiser ( newly enrolled- through my husband‚Äôs job)  won‚Äôt cover ketamine nor esketamine. So I think that was shocking to find out because I was hoping I could start affording them and would be stable.
Keep going!!! It‚Äôll be worth it! ‚ô•Ô∏è

Same, no euphoria which is what I started using it for since I experience anhedonia as a result of my depression. I‚Äôm just finally coming to terms that it does me no good. I want to be able to be sober and be proud that my moods good and bad are just as a result of me and not what I‚Äôm putting in my body to numb myself.

Yes, I had to switch to cocerta (20 mg). Vyvanse and adderall gave me the worst panic attacks on the come down followed by suicidal thoughts. Best thing to do is downs a ton of water and eat as much food as you can ( healthy food preferably) and then try to sleep it off.
Can you explain to me like I‚Äôm 5? Is this something that I need to change/take in order for my ssri to work?
I‚Äôm actually going to stop responding to those people who don‚Äôt make any plans. They just text you from time to time. W
Please get in touch with him! I need this to end happily ever after for you... or me or because that‚Äôs what I‚Äôve been taught in society.

I want you to know that what they‚Äôre doing is absolutely evil and vile. And whatever you do, don‚Äôt react to them ( if you can ). Someone on this sub introduced me to Hanlon‚Äôs razor theory. Look that up and think about it before reacting to them. 

It is not ok to be bullied. You are strong for not having reacted! You are not a pussy as your step dad is implying. You are strong!!! And just keep the principals involved. 

You‚Äôre the opposite of soft for not having reacted the way you imagine yourself to. Parents should be involved. They should stop this bullying. Please keep them involved. 

How they react is on them! And how you react is on you. You‚Äôre a good person for not having punched anyone. Keep on keeping on being strong üí™üèº ‚ô•Ô∏è
All day every day about everything. That‚Äôs the depression speaking usually. Guilt and shame for just being me. I feel shameful for my mood swings.

What if you live with a family member that says things unintentionally to piss you off? I‚Äôve been reading a book on shadow work by jung and today I just walked away. I actually went for a drive. But my god it‚Äôs so hard when you live with them! This is a temporary living situation and hoping by next year we can live in separate households but I would love to get your advice. Thanks in advance

I feel identical. I‚Äôm so sick of it. I bought a video game tonight. Spent 10 minutes on it, and gave up. I have a book next to me I‚Äôve been wanting to read but i know as soon as i start, I will lose interest. I‚Äôm constantly watching my mood. Obsessing over when I‚Äôll feel like myself again, so that I can enjoy myself for 5 minutes. And the stupid depression hits me again. I‚Äôm just forcing myself to sleep. I can‚Äôt stand myself being awake rn. Nothing help. Nothing. I‚Äôve tried everything you can think of short of ect. So ready to give up on this life if it weren‚Äôt for responsibilities and hurting other people.
I want to know as well. I‚Äôve been diagnosed with mdd but my dad is bi-polar and my anger issues resemble his. So I wonder if I‚Äôm bi-polar and if so if I‚Äôve tried the correct meds.

I did that and it stopped the withdrawls/brain zaps for good. However, my depression and anxiety came back with a vengeance so my doctor put me on 10 mg of brintellix.

I‚Äôm glad you‚Äôre feeling better. Cold turkey sends your whole system in shock so it makes sense to do a taper even if you were on a low dose. I‚Äôm extremely sensitive to any medication withdrawal . I was on only 70mg of Effexor ( the average person on Effexor takes around 150-200mg a day- every ssri has a different scale) 

if your withdrawal symptoms don‚Äôt improve, you should ask your doctor to put you on something low dose to help you get through your exams and then you can come off of that. That‚Äôs last option and obviously not preferable if you don‚Äôt like being on ssri.

Have you tried finding a recruiter that does this as a profession on LinkedIn ? When i spoke with my cousin about maybe moving to the Netherlands ( I currently live in the USA), he said they get employees that are from America all the time through recruiters.

I grew up in Germany. So I get why you love it there and I‚Äôm sure your kids would appreciate to have you there as their father! Best of luck!

Yeah, I would definitely taper so that you‚Äôre not experiencing withdrawals during your exam. I used to take like 10 little balls out of Effexor out of 100 in a capsule. And that‚Äôs was enough to stop all the crazy withdrawals and then I would take 9 the next day and so on. They tell you not to cold turkey quit ssris like Zoloft and Effexor because of these withdrawals. Effexor nausea and brain zaps were pure hell!! I became suicidal so I tapered instead and now I‚Äôm off but I‚Äôm on a anti-depressant with the least side effects: brintellix. 

That‚Äôs another option... You may have to switch to another ssri under your doctors supervision and then come off of that one. 

As with anything, exercise and drink a ton of water!
Taper. If you take capsules, open them up and take the least amount to stop withdrawals... I used to eyeball it with Effexor. I hate nothing more than brain zaps!! Best of luck <3
Yes, I‚Äôm ready to see men lose their shit cuz of hormonal imbalance lol THEY NEED TO UNDERSTAND

Idk about mdma.... the come downs have been horrible for me the few times I took them when i was younger. I can‚Äôt imagine having to deal with that up and down. Specially if you have ptsd. My mind used to get stuck on the come downs about how good I felt when I was up on mdma and I wanted to be that way forever.  ( it‚Äôs unrealistic I know.) and then I felt guilty about being down and my normal self again.

I need to do this!!! I can‚Äôt tell what‚Äôs doing what anymore. I take supplements and medications and have ups and downs. Not microdosing right now since I‚Äôm on an ssri. But great work! You‚Äôve inspired me to create a spreadsheet to keep track
100% agree with number 7. Fuck the news.

Did you start ability or cymbalta after your treatments or were you on them prior ? I ask because post infusion is when I have the energy to go see my psychiatrist and he switches meds since I‚Äôm feeling low. I‚Äôm confused if I feel better because of the infusion or my meds being switched. 

I had an infusion a month ago. Started feeling better a week post infusion and currently I‚Äôm crashing. But don‚Äôt have the means to get an infusion. I have the losenges at home but they don‚Äôt seem to help once I crash.

Try everything like someone said. 

I have the same exact issue. I hated seeing my dad be who he is growing up and now I see the patterns in me. And I see the victim mentality of my mom in me at the same time the reactive part! I hate it. I can‚Äôt believe I turned into them. 

There is an app called youper that‚Äôs helpful in moments like this. Although it‚Äôs an AI so the answers do get repetitive but it helps to cool down. 7 cups ( haven‚Äôt tried that one myself .) 

And of course finding a great therapist is a life saver. 

I do it all. Not just for anger but also depression and anxiety. If you leave the anger untreated it could turn into depression.
It does! Thanks guys!

I‚Äôve been prescribed troches for this reason. And If I don‚Äôt take them on a regular basis, I feel myself slipping back into my depression. I‚Äôm starting to think that it‚Äôs needed to be in your system continuously in order for you to not slip back into oblivion.

Ketamine therapy is brand sparkling new it seems and there is a lot of trial and error that goes along with the process right now. 

I always say this. It‚Äôs a roller coaster ride.

About 7 pounds in 3 months. Which is a lot for someone my size. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô2 and I weighed around 134. Now, I‚Äôm closer to my normal weight which is around 127. 

I started doing more yoga as well. So maybe that‚Äôs why I lost all the weight. But I don‚Äôt think I ate more than I usually do when I was on Effexor. I just felt overwhelmingly numb and indifferent. So maybe my metabolism felt the same way ?:‚Äù Who cares, lets just slow down. I don‚Äôt feel like processing food into energy fast enough.‚Äù 

This is just pure speculation.

I‚Äôm not really sure. I had a therapist once tell me that you just get hungrier on some anti-depressants. But I‚Äôm not certain that‚Äôs true. 

I don‚Äôt know if you can find a concrete answer. The truth is that we don‚Äôt know what exactly happens up there when we take an ssri. We have an idea but it‚Äôs not for certain. And it can mess with your hormones.
Are you saps on discord? Cuz I do see you...wonder if I messed something up on settings
Not op. Can you elaborate on protective circle  ? Or is that something I just need to learn more about on my own if I don‚Äôt know what it is already ?

I was on Effexor for only 3 months ( and other ssris for years prior- but I gained a bunch on Effexor )and after stopping my metabolism seems to have tripled. 

I think your body will adjust naturally. Going to the gym is never a bad idea so good on you<3

I don‚Äôt know how to fix the original post. Guess i should delete it and post it again. 

Here is the link that works. A very brief intro is needed before getting access to all the channels. ( whatever amount you‚Äôre comfortable with)

[https://discord.gg/KwnJcp5](https://discord.gg/KwnJcp5)

Awww thank you! I actually am getting better myself as well. The spike in my anxiety was unexpected. 

And boy do I feel dumb about replying instead of op üòÇü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
Hmm. Can‚Äôt figure out how to change the original posts‚Äôs link. I feel so stupid right now lol. Glad it worked for you.

I‚Äôve been on 10-15 different ssris and other meds to help with my anxiety and depression and I‚Äôm still on a low dose ssri. Brintellix 10mg. I still experience panic and hyper-vigilance if I go without any Benzo. Idk, my mind makes living hell for me when I‚Äôm off of benzos. And I was like that prior to getting on them. But if I don‚Äôt take them, I can‚Äôt be a functioning member of society.

I just started feeling well enough to reach out for therapy, again. Yes, I said well enough. And that‚Äôs the result of ketamine. Watching my mind under ketamine made me realize I really need help! 

I‚Äôve never felt withdrawals from benzos. I‚Äôve gone days without taking any just because I was too depressed to go get a refill. But eventually I know I need to go get a refill because of my hyper-vigilance state. Maybe that‚Äôs withdrawal? Idk anymore.

I hope I come off of them just like all the other meds I‚Äôm on . Including ketamine. But some of us actually take it because we need it, and not to get ‚Äúhigh.‚Äù  ( not saying anyone here is doing that- but that‚Äôs the stigma ) 

In my last therapy session, my therapist brought up the fact that I have so much shame and guilt around the fact that I to take meds. And right now I‚Äôm trying to focus on dropping that shame and guilt for starters.
When I started my ketamine treatments my panic and anxiety got worse. So it‚Äôs not easy cutting back on benzos right away. Specially, if you have a real panic disorder.
I‚Äôm 32. My mama lives with us. I need her and she needs me. And I get angry for stupid reasons all the time. It‚Äôs not worth it. Like you said, we both need each other.
That‚Äôs strange. Let me know if that one works.
https://discord.gg/KwnJcp5

I‚Äôm doing the ketamine treatment through a clinic. Although without assisted therapy. ( that would be awesome if it were available near me.) 

I‚Äôm doing MUCH better. But as with anything with depression, it‚Äôs a crutch. You have to do the other 50%. It‚Äôs still 80% better than ssri‚Äôs and tms alone as a crutch. 

And lastly, I still have ect in the back of my mind if I slip too far. 

I‚Äôve done TMS. Didn‚Äôt work. 

I‚Äôm still on a low dose ssri in conjunction with ketamine which I‚Äôm starting to question. 

Lastly, I do the fisher Wallace thing too at night for 40 minutes. But if I don‚Äôt do it continuously I don‚Äôt see results. It helps to mute the ruminating thoughts. I‚Äôm in no way advertising it. It‚Äôs really expensive. But my depression was so bad I started doing everything at once. 

My point is. I‚Äôm getting braver about ect if needed but right now I think ketamine is doing its job in unumbing me. It sure shows you there is hope! But it‚Äôs a roller coaster ride.

Edit: I said lastly but continued rambling lol

I do this so much. When I feel depressed I want to get my energy back and do something I enjoy. It‚Äôs so hard giving up control over my mood. 

My therapist actually brought that up. She said you know you can just accept that you‚Äôre depressed just for the moment. 

I really wanted to do something nice/fun with my husband tonight. But I think I just need to sleep.

When I get infusions or take a lozenge dose that has actually done its job, it always follows with some crazy amount of anxiety. Even during. I‚Äôm starting to think that‚Äôs because it brings out emotions in you that have been numbed by the depression for so long and we are not used to just sitting with our emotions. I for one like to bottle things up and put on a happy face,

I‚Äôve done both together recently. To be honest, it‚Äôs confusing what‚Äôs doing what.

So I‚Äôm taking a break from micro-dosing for now. ( I‚Äôm running out anyways .) And I‚Äôm also cutting back on ketamine to give my brain a break. 

I‚Äôm doing better. Much better. But I‚Äôm on new medication for both anxiety, depression and my adhd. 

If you start either therapy, try to do them separately. And write down as much as you can so you can look back and see what made you feel better isolated.

I‚Äôm 32 and had a crazy argument with my mother last night. We may never see each other and that‚Äôs ok.

There is a saying that goes something like if you want to know how enlightened you are spend a holiday with you parents. They KNOW how to push your buttons and some just do it.  So give yourself a break.

Edit: you may just be a neat person. Once you move out, you‚Äôll be able to arrange your home the way you like and no one will bother you. Keep that in mind. It is their house. So give them a break too.

Edit edit: apologize if you know in the wrong. I may have read your message not thoroughly the first time and just gave you some projected advice. If you think you were in the wrong, apologize and try to do better. They‚Äôll appreciate the crap out of that!

I do this. 

I‚Äôm starting to use my phone more like a pen-pal and I‚Äôm not ashamed..,. I feel much better. I‚Äôll get back you, when I have time. Thank you very much. Unless it‚Äôs urgent, I‚Äôm not responding. Unless, you‚Äôre by bff and we are having a deep convo. 

I even turn on the option ‚Äú I‚Äôm driving leave me alone ‚Äú message on so that no one expects an instant message from me. 

* Kermit sipping mint tea*

Edit: I went through and deleted all missed calls I didn‚Äôt care about last night. I deleted all other phone history of numbers that I don‚Äôt know. I‚Äôve deleted social media off of my phone. Specifically, during the week. What else.... oh I check my email only when I‚Äôm not overwhelmed ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

r/therapeuticketamine 

Not sure if that links it. But that was my intention.

I too have gotten emergency infusions. I find the comparison between ketamine treatments and getting sober fascinating. I‚Äôve been doing better the last few weeks. And thang what I feel like. Like I‚Äôm myself again. I want to do things. Things I‚Äôve always wanted to do. Since I was a child. And it seems depression has stopped me from doing all of those things when I finally got the opportunity to. So, I love that comparison.

That‚Äôs  been my issue. That‚Äôs the whole struggle with ketamine. When do you know you‚Äôve got enough ? or, sometimes I start wondering if it‚Äôs something I‚Äôm dependable on now in order to be in an ok/good mood just like an ssri. I get prescribed the Lozenges and I‚Äôm forever grateful. ( that‚Äôs probably saved my life ) But nothing has been consistent with ketamine. We are still in the earliest stages of studies and what not. 

We are left to color outside the lines at the moment and although it‚Äôs safe, it‚Äôs no fun playing self-psychiatrist when you‚Äôre trying to stop suffering from something like depression. 

If your suicidal thoughts are back that‚Äôs when I‚Äôd say you need more. Talk to your doctor. Ask about lozenges perhaps.

I also created this playlist that I listen to during infusions and lozenge sessions. [https://open.spotify.com/user/samsed-1987/playlist/0kAJpGXxevoa4VFsKumDuC?si=1ScYzVkoSKaro59tpcvMww](https://open.spotify.com/user/samsed-1987/playlist/0kAJpGXxevoa4VFsKumDuC?si=1ScYzVkoSKaro59tpcvMww) 

I have no idea why, but I‚Äôve posted it before and something in me makes me delete it ....probably thinking it‚Äôs not good enough üòèü§î

My doctor prescribed me Effexor and I made the mistake of not looking up withdrawals. I only took it for three months. Last month I was tapering and in hell.  Now I‚Äôm off but I had to go back on an anti-depressant ( brintellix 10mg) to stop the brain zaps and I‚Äôm pretty sure those are permanent.  My stomach is a mess as a result of Effexor as well. And still ‚Äú recovering‚Äù.

So I spoke to my doctor today. And he said that what I have is the generic. Methylphenidate hydrochloride and he said that it‚Äôs ok to split. He said if I had the brand name it would be impossible to split like you said. But he wants me to start taking it whole since 9 mg isn‚Äôt a lot. 

I‚Äôm kind of happy since I‚Äôve been able to concentrate and get work done and I actually want to do things and stick to plans which is unlike me. 

What I‚Äôm having problems with is eating during the day. I keep forgetting. And so I feel a slight crash in the afternoon. 

Idk, this has been working for me and I‚Äôve been feeling better more than I ever have. But I‚Äôm skeptical. Afraid I‚Äôll start crashing and feeling horrible like I did on vyvanse and adderall. Sorry I‚Äôm rambling.

Oh boy. No wonder my stomach has been such a mess. 

Thanks, I‚Äôll bring this up to him.

So my psychiatrist gave me the 18mg pills and told me to split them in half. So I was wrong! I take 9 mg. Some days, if I don‚Äôt eat or drink, I do feel a crash coming so I take the second half after I eat or drink. But the crash is nothing compared to vyvanse and or adderall thank god.
I actually do get hungry around 7 pm. Which didn‚Äôt happen when i was on stronger adhd meds like vyvanse and or adderall. Just gotta remember to eat during the day. Thank you.

Omg! I literally made a list of things I gotta do today right now and at the bottom I put in question marks ‚Äú eat??? When?‚Äù‚Äù‚Äù

And I‚Äôm only on 10mg of concerta. Gotta make a shake and force it down!

I struggle with mdd and adult onset adhd for about 10 years now. I‚Äôm super sensitive to withdrawals from medications like vyvanse and adderall and can‚Äôt take them. 

I‚Äôve been successful for about a month now and have been able to stabilize to start getting my life back on track. I‚Äôm studying to change careers( accounting to real estate- for now.) I actually had the motivation to leave my house today and go to the library to study for my exam. 

I still have trouble with concentration. I‚Äôm on a very low dose of concerta right now ( 10mg.) And it seems to help at least give me the motivation to avoid all distractions for a few hours so I can get work done.

So yes, ketamine has been a huge help. It‚Äôs not a cure as with anything for depression or adhd. But it‚Äôs been the greatest crutch by far for me to start putting the pieces of my life in an order that‚Äôs productive. 

We have a discord channel where we chat and other people who take ketamine for depression and similar issues ( such as myself ), are on there. Anyone is welcome to join :
[https://discord.gg/7KFBJm](https://discord.gg/7KFBJm)
Absolutely. That‚Äôs when I started seeing a real difference in my mood that was continues. They help maintain the boosters.

Every time I‚Äôm under a ketamine infusion ( maxed-credit cards yay.) I have a clear moment where I think to myself :‚Äù did I really need this? What the hell am I doing here‚Äù 

The infusions usually end with me weeping cuz I rather just not feel so many negative emotions and be dead. 

Depression will make you doubtful, destroy your self worth, and second guess every decision you make... even a diagnostic by a doctor is not enough to feel sure about anything.

I take the ketamine compounded lozenges at home. I live in California. I know a lot of people do. It‚Äôs good if you take long breaks in between and take them sparingly. They‚Äôre a 4 compared to a 10 In form IV form.
Hi. So once you‚Äôre in the intro channel. Write a short intro and we approve you to use other channels.

I care. Everyone wanting Medicare for all cares. I have insurance and have still fallen. It‚Äôs time that we start being treated with dignity in regards to our health and that we show corporations and profiteers that our health/illness is not a commodity.

Anti- American ? Sorry, for wanting to be able to afford our illnesses/injuries/accidents.... being alive. Hope you never get sent a hospital bill as large as I have with mother fucking insurance. PPO....
Medicare for all or we all fall
I have to ask, where is this? It looks like you have real seasons like fall.

Ketamine clinics need to buy those anxiety heavy blankets in my opinion. I‚Äôm bringing mine with next time! I get so cold..

Edit: lozenges are available in California, Virginia, And PA as far as I know this far.

The Iranian overthrow ruined all of our lives as Persians. Families split across the world. And our lives now in Iran are absolute shit because of the Islamic dictatorship. For the love of god, no war with lran. It‚Äôs citizens have nothing to do with the government ( at least most.) and have just as much hoped and dreams as any human on the plant. I feel like a lack of empathy is the only thing that drives us to war. We are all the same... for the most part.

Hi! My husband and I are in our 30‚Äôs and are also thinking about making the move from US to Netherlands. My cousins live there and I‚Äôve had a few conversations with them regarding this. I also grew up in Germany so learning Dutch shouldn‚Äôt be too hard for me but that‚Äôs not a necessity at the beginning at least in Netherlands because almost everyone speaks fluent English. The best way to do it is to find either a Dutch company to work for, or find a recruiter that can help you find a Dutch company to work for. I think you can do searches on google and LinkedIn.

We are going try to move if things don‚Äôt turn out so great for the both of us here soon. Best of luck ‚ô•Ô∏è

That‚Äôs how I feel when I‚Äôm having a depressive episode. I‚Äôve been hunting forever for a ‚Äòcure‚Äô or something to stabilize me. Recently, ( knock on wood) I‚Äôve had success! Don‚Äôt give up.. I know that‚Äôs so cliche of me to say. If you need to vent please dm me ‚ô•Ô∏è
Wow. I didn‚Äôt know people get offended ( someone downvoted your video )by a different perspective on a mental illness DSM. I posted the same exact video below.
I came here to post the same exact video. So odd. But heartwarming to see someone else saw and heard it ‚ô•Ô∏è

‚Äú Schizophrenia is a split however there is no split- ying and yang are the same, all one because one side of the coin couldn‚Äôt exist without the other. No up without down. You cannot split a coin ‚Äî just like light doesn‚Äôt exist without light doesn‚Äôt exist without dark. Schizophrenia is our label to attempt to separate that which is inseparable. ‚Äú- Fit outside the box with Carla 

This was a YouTube comment on the following video from Allan WattS:

 I just want you to know it‚Äôs the not the end of the world. I hope you seek help if you think you need it. Everything will be ok. ‚ô•Ô∏è

Let me know how it went :)
https://discord.gg/MB396D

I‚Äôve been having the same issue lately. I did a booster a week ago and could not disassociate at all. I haven‚Äôt increased my dosage in benzo and even went completely without it during the infusion. I hated not being to disassociate and kept checking my limbs etc. towards the end my anxiety kicked in cuz I felt so uncomfortable and I couldn‚Äôt stop crying. 

I‚Äôve had infusions before where I‚Äôve gotten high doses of benzo‚Äòs in iv form before or during the infusion. I disassociated just fine then. Specifically, during my first 6 infusions. I got strong benzo‚Äôs like versed. And or Ativan in iv form. So idk. I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs that.

I‚Äôm now on lozenges and my theory is that my tolerance has gone up. Don‚Äôt be shy in asking for a higher dosage until you feel relief. 

You may just be one of those people who builds a tolerance very quickly!! 

Albeit not being able to disassociate, I still feel the positive effects the next few days. It‚Äôs just not as great.

Edit: I did a google search and found this article very helpful. [https://emcrit.org/pulmcrit/ketamine-tolerance/](https://emcrit.org/pulmcrit/ketamine-tolerance/)

I‚Äôm brand new to the real estate world. Currently studying for my state exam. It makes me feel good that someone gained clients by simply being helpful and actually contributing to the community as opposed to schmoozing. Schmoozing is definitely not my style.

Communicate it with her, in the nicest possible way you can. If she offends you again, get a new therapists. It‚Äôs super hard to find a good therapist. But it‚Äôs also not worth it to go to someone who you don‚Äôt trust and who makes your anxiety worse. It‚Äôs happened to me and I end up feeling worse than before.

I feel this way when listening to a good conversation or reading a book I‚Äôm really interested in! It used to be Stern Stunde ( star hour in German) when podcasts didn‚Äôt exist. And now it‚Äôs podcasts. Specially, philosophical ones.. my brain start feeling hungry mid-way and by the end I feel so full and satisfied üòã....

Yup, start there. At the times where infusions are impossible for me to afford, Lozenges have been an absolute life saver. 

As far as frequency and dosage goes, my clinic is having me kind of color outside the lines and figure it out myself. Taking days off is a huge help. Sometimes a higher dose gives me relief. Sometimes a smaller. It‚Äôs not a necessity to take them every day.
